title: An expositon of all St. Pauls epistles together with an explanation of those other epistles of the apostles St. James, Peter, John & Jude : wherein the sense of every chapter and verse is analytically unfolded and the text enlightened. / David Dickson ...
author: Dickson, David, 1583?-1663.
publisher: Printed by R.I. for Francis Eglesfield ...,
notes: Translated from the Latin by William Retchford.
"The epistle of Paul to the Hebrews" has a special t.p., p. 215.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
